abstract: Consumer Product Safety Commission, prompted by accusations leveled in CBS News program 60 Minutes, announces that it is investigating whether Lumber Liquidators sold products with dangerous levels of formaldehyde.
lead_paragraph: The Consumer Product Safety Commission said it would investigate whether the flooring retailer sold products with dangerous levels of formaldehyde.

headline.main: Lumber Liquidators Faces U.S. Safety Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Lumber Liquidators Faces Inquiry by a Safety Agency

snippet: The Consumer Product Safety Commission said it would investigate whether the flooring retailer sold products with dangerous levels of formaldehyde.
